//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	declare ( /*@DECLARE_TYPE*/ FLOAT, "where" );
	wait ( 100.000 );
	set ( "where", $random( 0, 2 )$ );

	if ( $get( FLOAT, "where")$, $<$, $1.000$ )
	{

		task ( "spawn_first_place" )
		{
			use ( "tower_guy1" );
		}

		dowait ( "spawn_first_place" );
	}


	else (  )
	{

		task ( "spawn_second_place" )
		{
			use ( "tower_guy2" );
		}

		dowait ( "spawn_second_place" );
	}

}
